Summary •	More than 12 years of extensive hands on experience in multiple positions, during my career performed variety of roles that include Hardware Engineering, Server & Storage Specialist, Network Engineering, Network Administration & System Administration.  
• A proven track record of delivering high quality customer services & support. 
•	Have vast experience of Installation, Configuration, Maintenance & Service 
Support of IBM enterprise & midrange servers i-Series / p-Series ranging from old AS400/RS6000 to new Power6, Power7 platforms, IBM Blade Centers system p & system x (Windows Environment) & Hardware management consoles. 
•	Have vast experience of Installation, Configuration, Maintenance & Service Support of IBM Enterprise & midrange Storage, Tape libraries and printers Products including DS8000, DS6000, DS5000, DS4000, XIV, SVC, Storwise v7000, PureFlex System, SAN(Storage Area Network), Tape Libraries 3500 series, Large Printers 6500, 6400 and 4200 series. 
•	Have vast experience of installation, configuration, implementation, support & services of Microsoft windows servers 2003, 2008, 2012, Active Directory, Exchange servers, Win XP, 7, 8 and MS office suite.  
• Experienced in VMWare Workstation virtual machine creation, support, migration & management 
•	System Administrator in the planning, designing, installation and support for Windows Clustering, AIX, Virtualization & LPARs. 
•	Extensive experience working in Citrix & ITIL environment. 
•	Intermediate knowledge of Linux / Unix / AIX shell commands 
•	Extensive experience of HP hardware including installation, configuration & support. 
•	Extensive experience of troubleshooting Desktop PC & all kind of Laptops.  
• Have vast implementation & support of networking technologies (TCP/IP 
switches & routers) Intranet, LAN/WAN technologies (ADSL, firewalls), 
including Various Cisco products 7200, 3800, 3600, 2800, 2600 & 1700 
Series Routers, Cisco Catalyst 6500, 5500, 4500, and 2900 series Switches. Summary I'm an experienced and ambitious IT Specialist with a proven history in the industry. In my previous roles, I have worked as a Technical Specialist for IBM in the area of field services with close customer interaction. Building relationships with the customers and more importantly trust and honesty, both in my abilities as Technical Specialist, as well as in my knowledge of the products I supported from a technical aspect. I have always worked in a closely knit team, where team energy and collaboration and information sharing have always been important to me. I have the self-motivation to set priorities and work autonomously when results are required. 
My recent roles in the capacity of Technical Manager / Architect have expanded my Technical abilities where I provided both pre-sales and post-sales technical support. My most recent experience in the area of pre-sales has allowed me to take both my experience and knowledge to great achievements. I have fulfilled the role of Pre-Sales Architect for one of IBM's Top performing business partners with my concentration being on the IBM System x and IBM System Storage infrastructure. I pride myself on my ability to deliver solutions that meet and exceed customer requirements and expectations. 
 
My passion in IT has grown and developed into helping customers understand and realize the value in implementing well designed IT infrastructure. Allowing IT Departments to leverage of the features and function of each component and bring together a solution to deliver more Return on Investment as well as drive IT Departments in the business to become a key enabler in business agility and allowing the business to drive new opportunity with technologies such as Virtualization and Cloud Computing. Helping them understand how to achieve and derive results from IT. 
Most importantly, being able to share information with others and grow skill not just in the company but with customers, others and growing my own skill.
